data.description: This Opportunity WSP USA hosts hundreds of interns across the United States to gain hands-on, meaningful work experience to enhance their education and professional aptitude. Our interns gain exposure to real projects while working side by side with senior staff. Through our Developing Professionals Network, interns gain mentorship, networking opportunities and lifelong career connections. Our Transportation Planning Team is seeking a Transportation Planning Intern â€“ Summer 2026 to work out of our Philadelphia, PA office. WSP is currently following a hybrid work schedule targeting working on-site or in the office three days a week. This internship will be part of the WSP Summer Internship Program. As a summer intern, you have the opportunity to participate in our 12-week program scheduled to start on May 18th, 2026. The individual start date of the internship may be flexible. Your Impact - Conduct research and literature studies for a variety of transportation and planning p...
